actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: Joint resolution to authorize and request the President to issue annually a proclamation designating the week beginning on the third Sunday of October of each year as "National Drug Abuse Prevention Week."

summary.text: Authorizes the President to issue annually a procalamation designating the week beginning on the third Sunday of October of each year as "National Drug Abuse Prevention Week".

titles.title: Joint resolution to authorize and request the President to issue annually a proclamation designating the week beginning on the third Sunday of October of each year as "National Drug Abuse Prevention Week."
